name: The Last Light (Stagelily Studios)
description:
The Last Light is a game about cave exploration...

RANDOMLY GENERATED CAVES

Every cave is randomly generated, so no play-through will be the same.

ENEMIES

Slimes, Flying Jelly Fish, and all sorts of weird creatures down in the depths.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

MOUSE - AIM

LMB - FIRE LIGHT ORB
